ygData.subject: BAG OF TROLL GUTS
ygData.msgSnippet: In the Qeynos Bards guild there is a Quest to get Lute Strings for Fabian. Spoiler: First you need the Bag of Troll Guts.  This is found off of Zahal the Vile
ygData.messageBody:
In the Qeynos Bards guild there is a Quest to get Lute Strings for Fabian.


Spoiler:
First you need the Bag of Troll Guts. This is found off of Zahal the Vile
in North Karanas.
Next you Give the Bag of Troll Guts and 50 gold pieces to Saska? in the
Qeynos Bards Guild. She shall give you "Lute Strings" back and tell you to
take them to Fabian. It is important to give the 50 gold to her as well.
If you only give her the Bag of Troll guts she shall ask for the other items

and keep your bag.

But here I am stuck. I cannot Find Fabian. I ask the List for assistance.
I searched nearly every building in Qeynos with Tracking on but could not
find him. Does anyone know where he might be?

Has anyone Completed this quest? What is the result?

Thanks,
RADIA
42nd
Cazic-Thule
